Description_lang: While dual-wielding a pair of one-handed weapons, your damage done is increased by $s1%, your auto-attack damage with one-handed weapons is increased by $s5%, your movement speed is increased by $s3%, and your auto-attack critical strikes have a $H% chance to Enrage you.

description_blz.en_US: While dual-wielding a pair of one-handed weapons, your damage done is increased by 5%, your auto-attack damage with one-handed weapons is increased by 30%, your movement speed is increased by 5%, and your auto-attack critical strikes have a 50% chance to Enrage you.
description_blz.es_MX: Cuando usas dos armas de una mano, aumenta el daño que infliges un 5%, tu daño de ataques automáticos con armas de una mano aumenta un 30%, tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un 5% y tus golpes críticos de ataques automáticos tienen un 50% de probabilidad de enfurecerte.
description_blz.pt_BR: Ao empunhar ao mesmo tempo duas armas de uma mão, o dano que você causa aumenta em 5%, o dano do seu ataque automático com armas de uma mão aumenta em 30%, sua velocidade de movimento aumenta em 5% e seus acertos críticos de ataques automáticos têm 50% de chance de Enfurecer você.
description_blz.de_DE: Wenn Ihr in beiden Händen eine Einhandwaffe führt, wird Euer verursachter Schaden um 5%, Euer Schaden mit automatischen Angriffen beim Führen von Einhandwaffen um 30% und Eure Bewegungsgeschwindigkeit um 5% erhöht. Außerdem haben Eure kritischen Treffer mit automatischen Angriffen eine Chance von 50%, Euch in einen Wutzustand zu versetzen.
description_blz.en_GB: While dual-wielding a pair of one-handed weapons, your damage done is increased by 5%, your auto-attack damage with one-handed weapons is increased by 30%, your movement speed is increased by 5%, and your auto-attack critical strikes have a 50% chance to Enrage you.
description_blz.es_ES: Al empuñar dos armas de una mano, el daño que infliges aumenta un 5%, tu daño de ataque automático con armas de una mano aumenta un 30%, tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un 5% y tus golpes críticos de ataque automático tienen un 50% de enfurecerte.
description_blz.fr_FR: Lorsque vous maniez une paire d’armes à une main, les dégâts que vous infligez sont augmentés de 5 %, les dégâts de vos attaques automatiques avec des armes à une main sont augmentés de 30 %, votre vitesse de déplacement est augmentée de 5 % et vos coups critiques avec les attaques automatiques ont 50 % de chances de vous faire enrager.
description_blz.it_IT: Se si impugnano due armi a una mano, i danni inflitti aumentano del 5%, i danni inflitti dagli attacchi automatici con armi a una mano aumentano del 30%, la velocità di movimento aumenta del 5% e i colpi critici inferti con gli attacchi automatici hanno una probabilità del 50% di farti infuriare.
description_blz.ru_RU: Когда вы сражаетесь с оружием в каждой руке, наносимый урон увеличивается на 5%, урон от автоатак одноручным оружием увеличивается на 30%, скорость передвижения повышается на 5%, а ваши критические автоатаки с вероятностью 50% дают вам эффект исступления.
description_blz.ko_KR: 한손 무기 두 개를 쌍수로 사용하면 공격력이 5%만큼, 한손 무기로 사용하는 자동 공격의 공격력이 30%만큼, 이동 속도가 5%만큼 증가합니다. 또한 자동 공격이 치명타 및 극대화로 적중하면 50%의 확률로 격노합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 雙手各持一把單手武器時，你造成的傷害提高5%，用單手武器造成的自動攻擊傷害提高30%，移動速度提高5%，且自動攻擊造成致命一擊時，有50%的機率使你陷入狂怒。
description_blz.zh_CN: 当你双持单手武器时，你造成的伤害提高5%，你的单手武器的自动攻击伤害提高30%，你的移动速度提高5%，你的自动攻击爆击有50%的几率将你激怒。
